name: AI Powered Career Platform (Workify)
desc: MERN stack job portal featuring AI-driven chatbot (Gemini AI), JWT/Auth0 authentication, and Cloudinary resume handling. Boosted engagement by 40% and improved job status response efficiency by 60%.

name: School Management System
desc: Fullstack admin dashboard managing 1000+ users. Automated attendance, fees, and complaints with a 90-95% efficient system. Reduced admin workload by 80%.

name: Food Delivery Website
desc: Fullstack food delivery platform using NextJs, TailwindCSS, and MongoDB. Enabled real-time order tracking and advanced filtering, improving UX and reducing order delays by 50%.

name: E-Commerce Website
desc: Responsive online shopping platform using React, Tailwind CSS, and Stripe API for payments. Features product filtering, cart management, and secure checkout.

name: Weather Application
desc: Minimal weather app built with React and OpenWeather API. Shows real-time weather updates by city with clean UI and responsive layout.

name: Calculator App
desc: Modern calculator with clean UI built in JavaScript. Handles basic arithmetic and responsive design for all screen sizes.

name: To-Do List
desc: Simple and efficient task manager using React with localStorage persistence. Includes task filtering and intuitive UI for productivity.

name: Website Crawler
desc: Node.js-based crawler that extracts titles, links, and metadata from websites using Cheerio and Axios. Great for scraping and automation tasks.
